snippet.title: Oddworld: Stranger's Wrath - Mobile Trailer
snippet.description:
In the dusty, undeveloped wastelands of Western Mudos, cantankerous townsfolk find their settlements besieged by belligerent outlaws. Along comes Stranger, a tall, dark and enigmatic bounty hunter with a critter-firing crossbow.

Stranger is lured out of routine by the prospect of a one time, bounty-to-end-all bounties Moolah maker. He’s got a short but pricey personal shopping list and he’s finally found a way to check it off.

REMASTERED FOR MOBILE

First released in 2005, Stranger’s Wrath has been passionately upgraded for this all-new mobile release with all new controls that make the most of the mobile format and improved visuals throughout.

OUT NOW ON iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id923555295

COMING SOON TO ANDROID
